My name is Aaron Allen. My phone number is:

My email is: <EMAIL>

If someone could contact me it would be much appreciated. Thank you!

Aaron Allen

Describe your issue: Hello,

Can someone explain why I’m getting past due billing emails? I haven’t logged into my canva account in ages. I also am not using canva pro currently or any paid aspects of canva (bc I haven’t used canva in a long time). 

Can someone at Canva Please explain to me what’s going on here? I wonder if someone from my previous job is trying to use my account... which they shouldn’t be and they know they shouldn’t ... so ... i am concerned. I do have a canva account to clarify, have used it loads and love it, but I shouldn’t be charged or have anything past due. Please advise!!! 

Feel free to call me directly if I respond to slowly on email. My direct number is: <NUMBER>

I’ll try logging in if I remember to see if I can find out what the heck is going on here. Will probably need to update my password too... any insight though would be ideal ASAP please! 

Thanks!
